source-layers.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT the_geom_webmercator, zonedist, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) = '-' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[A-Z]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[0-9]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 3) ELSE zonedist END as primaryzone FROM zoning_districts_v201809) a

meta.description: NYC GIS Zoning Features September 2018, Bytes of the Big Apple
